This app\'s design and architecture were influenced by the Wikipedia app. In the spirit of both Oldschool Runescape Wiki and Wikipedia\'s free and open source principles, the OSRS Wiki app is and will always be free.

OSRS Wiki App Privacy Policy

The OSRS Wiki App is designed to respect your privacy. We collect minimal information necessary to provide our services.

1. INFORMATION WE COLLECT

Audio Data (Voice Search):
• Voice recordings when you use voice search
• Processed locally and sent to Google's speech recognition service
• Not stored permanently - processed in real-time only
• Used only to convert speech to text for search queries

Usage Data:
• Search queries to find OSRS Wiki content
• Page views for offline access and recommendations
• App performance metrics and crash reports

2. HOW WE USE YOUR INFORMATION

• Provide wiki content and search functionality
• Voice search: convert speech to text for hands-free searching
• Enable offline access by caching frequently accessed content
• Improve app performance and fix bugs

3. INFORMATION SHARING

We do not sell or transfer your personal information to third parties, except:
• Google Speech Recognition: processes voice data for speech-to-text
• OSRS Wiki API: search queries sent to retrieve content
• Google Play Services: in-app purchases processed through Google Play
• Legal requirements: when required by law

4. DATA SECURITY

• Voice recordings transmitted securely using HTTPS
• No persistent storage of voice data
• Search queries transmitted over secure connections
• Cached content stored locally on your device

5. YOUR RIGHTS AND CHOICES

• Voice search: optional feature you can choose not to use
• Microphone permission: can be revoked in device settings
• Cached data: can be cleared through app settings
• App deletion: removes all locally stored data

6. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY

Our app does not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13. If you believe your child has provided personal information, please contact us.

7. THIRD-PARTY SERVICES

This app integrates with:
• OSRS Wiki: content retrieval
• Google Play Services: app distribution and in-app purchases
• Google Speech Recognition: voice search functionality

Each service has its own privacy policy.

8. DATA RETENTION

• Voice recordings: not retained - processed in real-time only
• Search history: stored locally until app uninstalled or data cleared
• Offline content: stored until manually cleared
• Crash reports: retained for up to 90 days

9. CHANGES TO THIS POLICY

We may update this privacy policy from time to time. Significant changes will be communicated through app updates.

10. CONTACT US

For privacy questions or concerns, please contact us through the app's feedback system.

Note: This app is not affiliated with Jagex Ltd. Old School RuneScape is a trademark of Jagex Ltd.
